Perform.definition: to adhere to and fulfill the terms of [ an obligation] 2

1.definition: to adhere to and fulfill the terms of a contract, promise, or obligation [failed to under the agreement]

2.definition: to carry out or present something

3.definition: to do according to prescribed ritual or law [ a marriage ceremony]

4.definition: to give a public rendition or presentation of [ a copyrighted play]
